short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify Pushnews setup and notifications: validate SDK, check Service Worker, inject tags, and create notifications with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Pushnews Chrome Extension simplifies interactions with Pushnews, offering the following features:

- Installation Validation: Ensure the Pushnews JS SDK is correctly installed on the current page.
- Service Worker Validation: Verify the Pushnews Service Worker is active.
- Tag Injection: Easily inject the Pushnews JS SDK into any tab.
- Push Notification Creation: Quickly draft a push notification with the current tabâ€™s URL and pre-filled content (image, title, body).
